features: Print Labels Anytime, Anywhere - Create custom labels at home, school, or work! The MakeID labeler machine with tape weighs only 125g and prints multiple font styles, numbers, symbols, emojis, and icons.

Design Your Own Labels - The Bluetooth label printer connects wirelessly to compatible Android or iOS phones. Just download the free app and make personalized labels for your home office and office organization needs!

Clear & Lasting Prints - Thermal printing technology makes for sharp and precise outputs. The easy-peel-and-stick printing tape is waterproof, won't fade for years, and leaves no sticky glue residue. *Please try to avoid using it under direct sunlight, as the product may fade due to UV rays.
No More Torn Stickers - With its built-in cutter, our small label maker makes perfect labels a breeze. Simply wait for the label to come out of the printer and press the button to cut the tape.

Multiple Options To Choose From - Our portable label makers are available in different colors and 2 DPI resolutions: 203DPI and 300DPI. Our sticker tapes come in different cute colors and sizes which can fit 0.35"/0.47"/ 0.63" widths, too! The label maker comes with a built-in roll of 16mm x 4m starter tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Defs recommend! Easy to use and great Bluetooth connection
reviews.reviewText: The Makeid Label Maker Machine is a straightforward and reliable addition to my organization routine. It's easy to use, offers a variety of tape options for customization, and prints clear and durable labels. Compact and portable, it's a handy tool for keeping things organized in my home office without unnecessary complexities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use and does the job
reviews.reviewText: I'm looking to label a few boxes in my basement storage as well as my pickleball paddles for when I go to open play. This label maker is very easy to use and does exactly what I need it to do (text-based labels), plus you can add little stickers and images as well. The app is very easy to use and bluetooth connectivity is great. I'm glad I got this and not a fancier or pricier label maker. This is perfect for what I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well so far but VERY LIMITED. Correction : UPDATE!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased and am reviewing this one: https://amzn.to/3PCqp7EUPDATE and adding one more star: You can use your own pictures, so you can, in fact, make your own style and templates! You can create a word in Japanese for example in your favorite graphics editor, then add it to your label!!! GREAT!You CAN make a template in your fav graphics editor, select "picture" in the MakeID app, put in on your label and the MakeID app will allow you to type text over the image/picture! Great.Cons:I cannot add my own fonts or templates!I would give this 5 stars across the board otherwise (for the price).BUT, I need OTHER FONTS. I make labels for my Bonsai tree creations and I need a Japanese font.https://amzn.to/3XuQnf2Also, I need to make other templates! The templates included are ridiculous.Can't modify them or even upload your own graphic.No hearts on labels that don't say MOM and just so, so limited.TAPE IS EXPENSIVE. https://amzn.to/3NQGy71At the time I bought this, a roll of tape was almost half the price of the label maker! Ridiculous.So, no 5 star until price of tape comes down.Pros:For a cheap down and dirty label maker, this works.I DO LIKE that you DO NOT HAVE TO create an online account to use this. APP is easy to install.(Words of wisdom: "NEVER EVER BUY A TOOL in where you are forced to create an online account to use it". Also, once an app in installed, ANY APP not just this one, go to settings and remove ALL PERMISSIONS for said APP before you do anything else!)So... I pulled this out of the box, moved the included tape in correct position, turned it on, connected to my android via blue tooth and DONE, I made several labels within minutes of opening the box.The app was very easy to use.Seems to hold a charge for a while and I like the portability.Re-iterating - Easy, down and dirty if you need to make some easy, simple labels.Fin:If tape were cheaper (half of what it is now) and I could at least add my own fonts, I would label everything, use for all my projects and buy a couple more of these at this price point, no more.I will update you on longer performance after I go through both rolls of tape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Updated review as of 2/4/24The company reached out and asked me what the issue was with this label maker and after discussing the issue it was determined that if the battery gets too low for too long it will do a lockout to protect itself. The company offered to send me out a new label maker and it arrived safely and I have had no issues with the new one. I will keep it charged per their instructions in hopes this doesn't happen again. I do love this label maker as the app is simple to use and has a good amount of fonts to download, no emoji's but there are boarders that do have cute designs and that are simple. I do love this label maker but aside from that I wanted to comment on the customer service, they are a small company so they really listened to what the issue was and offered a solution. I, by no means, asked for a replacement as that was them offering it to me but for them to reach out and figure out what the issue was and then fix it was top notch in my book. Thank you Makeid!---------------I purchased this January 24, 2023 and I have only used it enough that I just bought replacement tape in November 2023. I have been trying to charge it for 3 days, it will stay yellow for about 15 minutes then turn a blinking red. If you buy this just be aware it won't last long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Reasonable print quality (300dpi). Labels stick well and come off without too much trouble. Great for labeling USB sticks, breaker panels, and a host of other things. I wish I had one of these years ago. I cannot comment on durability, but I hope it lasts forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sized printer for labels
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to create waterproof labels for some of my travel bottles and it works great! It’s easy to set up and easy to use. It also has symbols and frames you can use and it even allows you to print bar codes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Good size, not large and bulky. Great setup o my phone via Bluetooth. Recommend this product for easy label printing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy, fast and convenient, but beware of cutter
reviews.reviewText: I specifically chose this label printer because I wanted something to use for labeling quick file folder tab inserts, and the 12mm continuous tape is great for that! On an iPhone, the app works seamlessly and it’s very user intuitive. I printed a label a couple of minutes after unboxing. However, the cutter on this label printer sucks! See the photo I posted in my review for reference. I am guessing the cutter isn’t accounting for the curve of the label after it unravels from the roll, so when it slices, it’s a bit off. This crookedness bugs me…but for $15, I’m going to try to ignore my perfectionist mindset because this still beats using a Sharpie for labeling, and the app is so darn easy. I do wonder if there is an upgraded version of this that cuts straight, and maybe I’ll downgrade this printer as a “backup.”Oh and one more thing, the labels for this printer are kind of pricey for the amount you get. I’m hoping to find a generic label tape that’s compatible.
Me encantó, fácil de usar y súper práctica.
nunca sirvió no se pudo sincronizar con el teléfono
J’étiquette tout dans la maison.C’est rapide et silencieux, je Wow!!!
